info.brief_description: Vore story starring Krystal from the StarFox games!
info.description:
Yes, another StarFox vore story written by me, only this time, it centers around Krystal! If you don't know who Krystal is, then stop only playing StarFox 64 and play the games in the rest of the series.

Now, for the rules:

1: Krystal is PREY only!
2: No one sentance or incredibly short chapters (Unless otherwise noted)
